website_summaries.verdict: A simple silverware dishwasher basket that is built to withstand the power of many washes.
pros: Basket is compatible with most dishwashers, not just Whirlpool
The tall, wide handle makes it easy to lift the basket out
Basket is sturdy and feels built to last
There are open compartments on either end and a flip-down lid in the middle to separate knives
The basket doesn't collect water so you can safely pull it from the dishwasher without soaking yourself
cons: Basket sits at a slightly higher price point than competitors

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT FOR kITCHENAID !!!
customer_reviews.text: NOTHING TO DISLIKE, HERE!!!! I ordered this basket because it looked exactly like my original basket and other reviewers suggested they had good luck using it in their KitchenAid. This one actually seems heavier / more durable than the basket that came with the dishwasher! Like other's I apparently had a burn-out in the left section of the original basket. I started having flatware drop through a hole that formed, catching, so basket resisted moving forward. Will definitely order again should need arise!!!
customer_reviews.author: marty

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have a KitchenAid KUDS3IX and the current basket has no back "shield" on it, so everytime you pull the rack in and out, any wayward knife or fork abrades the seal. Although this is not specified for my machine, the measurements were close enough to take a gamble on. It arrived today, direct drop in, no more seal damage. PS: The measurements on the product description are very accurate, so measure with confidence. This type of basket should be standard issue on any dishwasher that has the silverware basket on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Grill Head

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for my failing silverware basket. After dealing with holes in the bottom of my previous basket that allowed silverware to drop down once in a while, I finally wised up and ordered a replacement. It is the exact part I needed at a much better price. I can see that the basket needs to be replaced every few years as silverware gets sort of dropped in and hits the bottom on a daily basis. No problem as long as I get get another one when I need it. It is sturdy, but the constant abuse it has to withstand is understandable.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra D

customer_reviews.title: All Once Pieces Sized To Replace Flimsy 3-Piece Baskets
customer_reviews.text: The 3-piece silverware basket that came with my Kenmore / Whirlpool dishwasher was junk from the start. The plastic was brittle and kept breaking apart. I bought replacements with the same outcome. I've only had this new basket for 2 months, so I cannot yet speak to its durability. But what I CAN say is that it fits in the same location and I love that it is all one unit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Preyer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just installed. Looks bigger but fits. Don't know about sturdiness yet. Our other basket broke on the bottom in many places and we had to patch and patch and patch. Finally gave up on the original; so I hope this one is sturdier. We like to place the steak knives down to avoid injury; but baskets don't stand up to the usage over the y years.
customer_reviews.author: Darleen March

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly. This is my second time to need to replace. Our Kitchen Aide dishwasher is ten years old. It works great except for needing to replace container because of holes. The new container even had “Kitchen Aide” embedded on the handle. I noticed the early sign of Deterioration this time; so I’m hopeful that damage didn’t occur!
customer_reviews.author: Nana the Grandmother

customer_reviews.title: It fits and it replaces the old one
customer_reviews.text: It fits and replaces the old one. I am going to modify the bottom of the tray with lighting egg-crate to ensure the silverware does not poke a hole in the bottom and wear it out last the last one did from the factory. This has the same material, so the assumption is it will last a couple years and the bottom will wear out. Still a weakness in the design.
customer_reviews.author: ForrestA

customer_reviews.title: Exactly right for Kitchenaid
customer_reviews.text: Getting the right replacement parts for old appliances is not always easy. Having read the reviews on Amazon by other people who bought this product I took a chance that this was the one. This is the exact duplicate of my Kitchenaid dishwasher silverware basket. Like others, the bottom of my old basket became crumbly and got holes in it. Now we're good for another decade of flawless dish washing.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonMac

customer_reviews.title: Practical replacement basket for different brand dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: After careful measuring for proper fit, purchased to replace worn basket on different brand dishwasher. Works better than the original. Like the extended back that keeps silverware from scraping the gasket when closing/rolling the bottom basket. Holds a lot of silverware. Cost a little more than others but very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Graspit

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the Product we Needed
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the basket we needed for our Kitchen Aid dishwasher, even though it was promoted for Whirlpool units. It is a perfect fit and very functional. We are, however, prepared for it to melt again due to the design of the dishwasher - no fault of this component, just how it is positioned near a heating element.
customer_reviews.author: LMc

customer_reviews.title: Fits our Kitchen Aid
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found this on Amazon. We have an older dishwasher, no ideal the model number. This one had the same measurement as the one that came with our dishwasher. It fits our Kitchen Aid perfect. Looks just like the one that needed to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: H Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good Replacement Silverware Basket
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a new Whirlpool dishwasher, and to our dismay the silverware basket that it came with is too small. It is almost a joke how small and narrow it is. It could barely fit any silverware - and I knew it wasn't going to work. So I purchased this one and so far so good. It is much bigger and holds a lot of silverware. Feels pretty sturdy. I had to put it in the bottom on the side that is along the door. Worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT REPLACEMENT FOR MY KITCHENAID DISHWASHER
customer_reviews.text: After almost 10 years I had to replace our KitchenAid basket, which got a hole in two of the slots about a year ago because a plastic long handled item slipped through and melted. This is exactly the same basket.
customer_reviews.author: CinColo

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect/Quick Shipping!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit for dishwasher bought new in 2008. I guess the other reviewers were correct in saying the back part of the basket sits too close to the heating element. My old basket from 2008 was crumbling at the bottom so I replaced it. Came with the cover for top of middle part of basket, I used the old basket covers for the end parts.
customer_reviews.author: CFoose

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and seems a little heavier plastic
customer_reviews.text: My silverware basket had several holes which allowed the silverware to fall through and stop the rack from pulling forward. This basket fit perfectly and it is wonderful to be able to use the entire length of the basket. The plastic seems thicker than the basket that had the holes in it and I am looking forward to many good years.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Norman

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one of these baskets several years ago to replace the original basket in my dishwasher. I was truly satisfied, because it was a perfect fit for my Kitchenaid Dishwasher; it was configured in the same way. When I purchased a new Kitchenaid four months ago, the basket was inadvertently left in the old dishwasher. The new basket system was not satisfactory. In fact, it did not meet my needs for cutlery. So, I repurchased the Whirlpool basket and it again was the perfect fit for my needs and the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid replacement basket
customer_reviews.text: Great non-expensive replacement basket Nice and sturdy! Purchased based on measurements and eventhough it said whirlpool it looked like it would work. We actually received a Kitchenaid brand basket which worked out perfect for is since that's what our dishwasher washer was!
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: The perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for... very satisfied...my previous basket had developed holes where my serrated knives bore into the bottom of the basket rendering the basket useless because my Utensils would then fall thru the holes..this was the perfect replacement
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Same as the old one
customer_reviews.text: We needed a replacement and didn't know the best way to go about getting one. We found it on Amazon for a decent price and it is exactly the replacement we needed. It was for a KitchenAid dishwasher not a Whirlpool.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Saggett

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and good value
customer_reviews.text: This was the item that was crossed over to when using my KItchenAid parts diagram. I was worried that it would say "Whirlpool" on it, but it was actually marked "KitchenAid"! It fits just fine, and though it is not identical to the basket it is replacing, I have found that it works as well or better than the original.
customer_reviews.author: amborider

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly. The only thing was that it was gray and I would have preferred white but this was my fault for not reading the description more closely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: exact replacement for my KitchenAid dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher basket is an exact replacement for my KitchenAid dishwasher. As with many other reviews, the bottom on my old basket wore through. I am very happy to get the exact replacement, especially so quickly (just a couple of days), and at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine in my kitchenaid dishwasher,
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the identical one in my 3 year old dishwasher. The bottom grid had become fragile and broken so two of the compartments couldn't be used. This appears to be made if the same material, so I didn't want to spend any more than I had to for something I'd have to replace every three years. Two weeks later, the dishwasher stopped working. Rather than spend money on the 3rd major repair in 3 years, I replaced the dishwasher, so can't give any feedback on how long the rack held together,
customer_reviews.author: Janet Crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for the original.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 5 stars as we have used the basket now for a few months and it is holding up fine. It replaced the original one that came with our Whirlpool dishwasher. The original basket had pieces breaking out of the bottom so the utensils were falling through the wholes. I don't put my utensils point down so not sure why they made the original basket so brittle that it was breaking within a few years. This new one fits perfectly but be prepared for the top edge to feel much thinner than the original one. Hopefully it will last longer though. So far... so good!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fits KitchenAid dishwasher perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This basket is an exact match to the original silverware basket that came with my KitchenAid dishwasher (circa 2003 model). It snapped right into place perfectly. Very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: s. wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit and Decent Quality
customer_reviews.text: It fits and does the trick. Nothing special just a replacement for the original which became brittle and fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for dishwasher silverware holder
customer_reviews.text: This works good as a replacement for silverware holder. It also has a good part for knives to keep them separate.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Y Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: Holding up well so far. IT is replacing a holder that had multiple holes. I am hoping by using this that I can hold off on buying a new dishwasher for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a basket that started disintegrating and breaking apart. While it is a perfect match, unfortunately my dishwasher died approximately 2 months after I put it in there. Now I have a perfect silverware basket and no dishwasher to use it in.
customer_reviews.author: colette grewe

customer_reviews.title: An exact replacement for the original basket.
customer_reviews.text: Exact same as the original - works well. The bottom of it gets brittle every 2-3 years, so I have to replace it - probably to close to the heating coil. Anyhow, this is a 2nd replacement I bought and I am happy with it. Thx!
customer_reviews.author: Grzegorz Tokarski

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for my Kitchen Aid dishwasher basket
customer_reviews.text: My dish washer is 12 years old and the silverware basket was breaking apart in a few places allowing silverware to fall through the basket. I have a Kitchen Aid dishwasher and had to take the handle off my old basket and put it on the new one.
customer_reviews.author: SheShePTC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: Have a 14 year old KitchenAid KUDP01ILWH6 dishwasher. The original basket finally deteriorated and needed to be replaced. This replacement was an exact fit.
customer_reviews.author: George M.

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to replace worn out one in my 5 year old Kitchen Aid dishwasher. It's exactly like the original and I am pleased that is so.
customer_reviews.author: B. N. Chittenden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about ordering this one because reviews indicated different size measurements. However, the picture was an exact match for my Kitchenaid dishwasher (was not sure of the model number). Luckily, the item is an exact fit and I am delighted to have full functionality of the rack. i am a little disappointed with the fact that this does seem to be a design flaw from this dishwasher, but will not deduct stars from this for that.
customer_reviews.author: SJ family

customer_reviews.title: It holds the silverware
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be the sam as OE. My original one had pits of the bottom that had come out so silver fell through it. This fits fine and was far cheaper than local supplier.
customer_reviews.author: MiataPaul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Now my dishwasher is new again. I had a weathered and deteriorating basket. I replaced it with this one, and all is good again.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnB in North Hills

customer_reviews.title: Fits Kitchenaide KUDS010LSS2
customer_reviews.text: It is not an exact duplicate in that (as you can see from the picture) it does not have flip-down lids on the left and right side. However the external dimensions are correct, and the construction of the grid material is the same. It is just over 1/2 the cost of a replacement through the manufacturer. So it is a cost effective substitute. (I kept the old one for grid material to fix this one in the future if I need to.)
customer_reviews.author: Coyote

customer_reviews.title: good replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the original. Unfortunately, the design/material is such that it won't stand up to the scouring of the dishwasher for the life of the dishwasher. They seem to last 2-3 years before the bottom starts dropping out. And the price on Amazon was good (esp. w/free shipping), saving me about 1/3 off my local retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Magdan

customer_reviews.title: Defective Silverware Basket, Send Another
customer_reviews.text: Basket arrived with missing pieces in silverware slot, your silverware will be deposited in the bottom of your dishwasher. Please ship another out. Please and thank you...
customer_reviews.author: SRG

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So glad I was able to purchase in here. Our other basket broke. This one is sturdy & fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Correct OEM Part
customer_reviews.text: The original lasted 10 years. We'll see how long this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Thank-you so much, I now have a cutlery caddy that actually hold cutlery I have a kitchenaid dishwasher model # KUD102CRWH0 and it fits like the original I ordered this caddy on March 4 2014 and it arrived via Canada post on March 11 2014 to Ontario Canada I feel kitchenaid should have replaced the defective baskets free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my Whirlpool dishwasher.  Check you model number first for compatibility before ordering.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and fits perfectly in my Whirlpool dishwasher. Only thing is that the handles of my larger forks do not fit into the fold down grates on the top. At least the grate was easy to fold up and/or remove when needed,
customer_reviews.author: Timothy K. Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 12 year old dishwasher. Doesn't have the 'trim' the original had, but that makes it lighter, and really, it holds our table ware just as well.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Billings

customer_reviews.title: Basket for dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Brand name, and was much needed. Works the same as original.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki B.

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect for my model 8573025 Kitchen Aid
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! After 7 years, the plastic grids at the bottom were wearing out. I was hesitant to buy it because my model number isn't listed. 8573025B. It's an exact replica of the old one so it fits!
customer_reviews.author: gojd

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfectly and it is very sturdy. Our original basked was starting to crack and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the exact silverware basket that we needed. Our dish washer is Kitchen Aid, and this basked what actually branded Kitchen Aid instead of Whirlpool (which I think makes the washer and different brand names). It fit perfectly and it is very sturdy. Our original basked was starting to crack and it is a perfect substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Cito Martin

customer_reviews.title: Replacement basket for dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my dishwasher. Decent price for a replacement basket. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Gina R Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for an old rack
customer_reviews.text: I had an old rack that the bottom was melted due to its proximity to the heating coil. I finally gave in and bought a new rack. This item is a perfect replacement. Let's see how long this will last.
customer_reviews.author: fildefer98

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: It’s just like the utensil tray that came with my dishwasher. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Colonelmom75

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher silverware basket replacement
customer_reviews.text: It was the exact replacement Price was more than reasonable. Delivered before target date. No problems at all
customer_reviews.author: big daddy

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It is an exact replacement for the silverware basket that we had. The plastic had broken on the original so we were only able to use the two pockets on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss

customer_reviews.title: OEM
customer_reviews.text: If it lasts as long as the original I'll be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fits our dishwasher perfectly. I am so grateful to find this at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: LJE

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but could use alteration
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my Kenmore basket. This new basket could use either more basket separations to create smaller silverware segments or covers with slits to insert silverware. Silverware pieces tend to fall over on each other. It seems sturdier than the Kenmore basket which fell apart/melted and caused silverware to fall through the bottom.. Kenmore did have slotted covers for the openings which allowed silverware to be separated and stood up. I'm going to search for basket covers for this unit. It looks like it should hold them easily.
customer_reviews.author: JoanieK

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement for factory basket and great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and replacement for old basket which had a hole in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Zleff

customer_reviews.title: The exact thing for less !!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this the perfect replacement for the basket that finally gave out after 10 years, it iseems exactly the same as the original - and for less than half the cost the manufacturer of the dishwasher wanted for the same item. We are thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a replacement part when we were listing our house for sale. It fit the dishwasher as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Meg

customer_reviews.title: MAYTAG REPLACEMENT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the basket in my Maytag dishwasher and it fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: cathy smith

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Our old silver ware holder broke and out machine is so old they don't make the replacement. This fit perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Fit my KitchenAid
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of my basket was falling apart so my utensils were falling through. This replacement fit perfectly in my Kitchenaid dishwasher.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found this on amazon! Our original silverware basket broke and this was the exact one!

customer_reviews.title: Don't need a new dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Thank you, delivered pronto, in perfect condition, And, @ a lower price!
customer_reviews.author: K. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: bad design by the dishwasher manufacturer makes it so these ...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worked in my kitchenaid..bad design by the dishwasher manufacturer makes it so these have to be replaced every year or so..
customer_reviews.author: Armyfister

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Love that I paid almost half of the manufacturer’s price. Fit perfectly .
customer_reviews.author: CCP

customer_reviews.title: Whirlpool Silverware basket 8562043
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this silverware replacement basket. It is the exact same basket as the original. Hopefully it will last longer than the original one, which was slowly breaking apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: What I needed!
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to get all excited about a cutlery holder for your dishwasher,.. until your old one is junk and cannot be used anymore. This was a perfect fit for my Kitchen Aid dishwasher. It works exactly as it should and has all the compartments one could want...a place for knives, etc.
customer_reviews.author: WomanInBell

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in my Whirlpool washer
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in my Whirlpool washer. It's a little longer than the original unit which makes it fit better and hold more. Also better made than the original.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P

customer_reviews.title: Exact OEM replacement
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly that same as what came with the dishwasher. The manufacture seem to have some planed obsolence, because it's not very durable with sharp items. Whirlpol / Kitchenaid should make the basket out of a glass filled plastic so that it's more durable with sharp items.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement for my Kitchenaid
customer_reviews.text: After a few years of heavy use, the bottom of the original basket melted and/or got brittle. I wash knives blade-down which takes it's toll on plastic too. This Whirlpool basket is the exact part number of my Kitchenaid basket and is a perfect fit. I'm sure it will last a couple years more.
customer_reviews.author: W. Overton

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed. As advertised. The way Amazon checks to make sure you are getting the right item for your brand and model of dishwasher was fool proof! Thanks!! No more silverware falling through the basket!
customer_reviews.author: ClassElady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for our KitchenAid. Description said it was white, glad it is gray.
customer_reviews.author: A & C in MI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a broken one and is still working well after a year

customer_reviews.title: Exact Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Exact replacement for the Whirlpool dishwasher utensil basket that had developed holes over the past 10 years.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our Kitchen Aid dishwasher. Exact match for the original.
customer_reviews.author: SYOTW

customer_reviews.title: Direct replacement
customer_reviews.text: Functioning as a direct replacement. Not exactly the same as our original but fit/function are very similar.

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly like the original one. Fits and works perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as shown in picture, but does have the Kitchenaid logo. Look closely at the picture and you will see the Kitchenaid logo right above the handle. This was an exact replacement for my Kitchenaid dishwasher which broke after 5 years. Looks like the OEM item.
customer_reviews.author: DIY.MAN

customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the Kitchen Aid dishwasher basket I replaced and was much less expensive through Amazon than Whirpool/Kitchen Aid's official online replacement part site! Score!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This basket fitted right in and looks just like my original one. I'm very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement!
customer_reviews.text: This basket works perfectly for our Kitchenaid. Fits perfect! Great hard plastic! Doesn't seem to melt away like the other ones do. I was very happy finding a replacement!

customer_reviews.title: I have a kitchen aid dishwasher which I love..

customer_reviews.title: Good durable replacement product
customer_reviews.text: The original basket that came with the dishwasher turned brittle within a few months and pieces started braking off. This one doesn't have this problem. The only thing i am missing is the hook on the side that kept the old basket from sliding. But it is not a big issue.

customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect replacement. The one that came with the dishwasher only lasted 5 years before breaking apart. Hoping this one last as long or longer.
customer_reviews.author: Helder F. Jacinto

customer_reviews.title: kitchenaid dishwasher part
customer_reviews.text: Exact replacement for the rack that came in our kitchenaid. Too bad these racks have not been redesigned to withstand more abuse. The bottoms of the sections begin to break out after a few years. Probably from utensils being dropped into the rack from several inches up. She's happy so I am too. Thanks again amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in my Kitchenaid
customer_reviews.text: My Kitchen Aid dishwasher is only a few years old and I needed to replace the basket (never had to that on other Brands). Read reviews on this and they were correct. It fits Kitchen Aid perfectly and even says Kitchen Aid on the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Sarj

customer_reviews.title: New Basket Simple To Replace-No Tools
customer_reviews.text: My Dishwasher basket was broken in a few places not holding silverware. Bought this and put it in. Now we have a place to put all the silverware. You can do this!
customer_reviews.author: ALLEN F.

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: As expected, fits in our kitchen aid dishwasher perfectly. This is the third one purchased in 10 years. Wish this item would last more than a few years. Price is better than other sites.
customer_reviews.author: KatieF7609

customer_reviews.title: Direct replacement
customer_reviews.text: Kinda expensive for what it is. Old basket lasted maybe 5ish years.
customer_reviews.author: Mista Kut

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good replacement but still all have the same issue with the bottom breaking out
customer_reviews.author: M att

customer_reviews.title: Very fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived next day and fits perfectly in my Kitchenaid Dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a house and found that the dishwasher utinsil basket in our dishwasher had melted holes in it, causing our forks, knives, and all other utinsils to fall through. I checked at Amazon and found this replacement for $10 less than Sears. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: acemom
